languages.text: {n}Пилоты переглядываются, и один с мерзкой улыбкой сообщает:{/n} "Собираешься удрать, мон-кай? Кажется, это ты в наших руках, а не мы — в твоих?"
{n}The pilots exchange glances, and one of them says with a nasty smile,{/n} "Are you trying to escape, mon-keigh? Don't you think you are the one in our hands, not the other way around?"
languages.original_text: {n}Пилоты переглядываются, и один с мерзкой улыбкой сообщает:{/n} "Собираешься удрать, мон-кай? Кажется, это ты в наших руках, а не мы — в твоих?"

traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot

traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot

traits.locale_text: {n}The pilots exchange glances, and one of them says with a nasty smile,{/n} "Are you trying to escape, mon-keigh? Don't you think you are the one in our hands, not the other way around?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot

languages.text: {n}Les pilotes échangent un regard entendu, et l'un d'eux vous demande, un sourire mauvais sur les lèvres :{/n}« Vous essayez de vous enfuir, mon-keigh ? Vous croyez être en position de force ? J'ai l'impression que c'est plutôt l'inverse... »
languages.original_text: {n}The pilots exchange glances, and one of them says with a nasty smile,{/n} "Are you trying to escape, mon-keigh? Don't you think you are the one in our hands, not the other way around?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Les pilotes échangent un regard entendu, et l'un d'eux vous demande, un sourire mauvais sur les lèvres :{/n}« Vous essayez de vous enfuir, mon-keigh ? Vous croyez être en position de force ? J'ai l'impression que c'est plutôt l'inverse... »
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot

languages.text: {n}这两名飞行员互视一眼，其中一个人脸上带着令人厌恶的笑容。{/n}“你是打算逃跑吗，猴子？你不觉得，现在是你落在我们手里了吗？你哪来的胆子发号施令？”
languages.original_text: {n}The pilots exchange glances, and one of them says with a nasty smile,{/n} "Are you trying to escape, mon-keigh? Don't you think you are the one in our hands, not the other way around?"

traits.locale_text: {n}这两名飞行员互视一眼，其中一个人脸上带着令人厌恶的笑容。{/n}“你是打算逃跑吗，猴子？你不觉得，现在是你落在我们手里了吗？你哪来的胆子发号施令？”
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot

languages.text: {n}操舵手たちはお互いを見やると、そのうちの一人が意地の悪い笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「逃げるつもりなのか、モン＝ケイよ。ハメられたのは俺たちではなく、自分だとは思わないのか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The pilots exchange glances, and one of them says with a nasty smile,{/n} "Are you trying to escape, mon-keigh? Don't you think you are the one in our hands, not the other way around?"

traits.locale_text: {n}操舵手たちはお互いを見やると、そのうちの一人が意地の悪い笑みを浮かべた。{/n}「逃げるつもりなのか、モン＝ケイよ。ハメられたのは俺たちではなく、自分だとは思わないのか？」
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot

languages.text: {n}Die Piloten tauschen untereinander Blicke aus. Einer von ihnen grinst dich hinterhältig an und sagt:{/n} "Wollt Ihr etwa fliehen, Chem-Pan-Sey? Vielleicht seid Ihr es ja, {mf|der|die} von uns abhängig ist und nicht andersherum?"
languages.original_text: {n}The pilots exchange glances, and one of them says with a nasty smile,{/n} "Are you trying to escape, mon-keigh? Don't you think you are the one in our hands, not the other way around?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Piloten tauschen untereinander Blicke aus. Einer von ihnen grinst dich hinterhältig an und sagt:{/n} "Wollt Ihr etwa fliehen, Chem-Pan-Sey? Vielleicht seid Ihr es ja, {mf|der|die} von uns abhängig ist und nicht andersherum?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot

languages.text: {n}Los pilotos intercambian una mirada, y uno de ellos esboza una desagradable sonrisa.{/n} «¿Intentas escapar, mon-keigh? ¿No te parece que eres tú quien está en nuestras manos, y no al revés?».
languages.original_text: {n}The pilots exchange glances, and one of them says with a nasty smile,{/n} "Are you trying to escape, mon-keigh? Don't you think you are the one in our hands, not the other way around?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Los pilotos intercambian una mirada, y uno de ellos esboza una desagradable sonrisa.{/n} «¿Intentas escapar, mon-keigh? ¿No te parece que eres tú quien está en nuestras manos, y no al revés?».
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot

languages.text: {n}Pilotlar göz göze geliyor. İçlerinden biri, nahoş bir gülümsemeyle lafa başlıyor.{/n} "Kaçmaya mı çalışıyorsun mon-keigh? Acaba asıl sen bizim elimize düşmüş olabilir misin?"
languages.original_text: {n}The pilots exchange glances, and one of them says with a nasty smile,{/n} "Are you trying to escape, mon-keigh? Don't you think you are the one in our hands, not the other way around?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Pilotlar göz göze geliyor. İçlerinden biri, nahoş bir gülümsemeyle lafa başlıyor.{/n} "Kaçmaya mı çalışıyorsun mon-keigh? Acaba asıl sen bizim elimize düşmüş olabilir misin?"
traits.speaker: DrukhariPilot
